entries.journal_entry_description: Speak with Harroom in the tent next to Sordaan's hunting cabin.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Speak with Harroom to receive a Fallann Hyper-Rifle from Sordaan's weapon collection.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Speak with Harroom to receive a Xris Acid Sword from Sordaan's weapon collection.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Speak with Harroom to receive a Kalranoos Carbine from Sordaan's weapon collection.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Speak with Harroom to receive a Tchotchee Pistol from Sordaan's weapon collection.
